resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/81641</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>81641</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>NCTE_Scoilnet</catalog>
            <entry>4618</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Frequently Asked Questions about the LCA</string>
            <string language="es">Preguntas frecuentes sobre el LCA</string>
            <string language="ga">Ceisteanna Chuirtear go Minic faoin ATF</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Häufig gestellte Fragen über das LCA</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Questions fréquemment posées au sujet du LCA</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Perguntas freqüentemente feitas sobre o LCA</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Domande frequentemente fatte circa il LCA</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Συχνά ερωτήσεις για το LCA</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This resource aims to answer some of the questions parents and students ask about the LCA programme.  The answers supplied are one teacher's responses to these questions.  </string>
            <string language="es">Este recurso tiene como objeto responder algunas de las preguntas que los padres y los estudiantes hacen sobre el programa LCA. Las respuestas ofrecidas son las respuestas de los profesores a estas preguntas.  </string>
            <string language="ga">Déanann an acmhainn seo iarracht roinnt de na ceisteanna a bhíonn ag tuismitheoirí agus daltaí  faoi chlár an ATF. Is freagraí múinteora amháin a chuirtear ar fáil mar fhreagraí samplacha ar na ceisteanna seo.  </string>
          </description>
          <language>en</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">LCA</string>
            <string language="es">LCA. Hoja de consejos</string>
            <string language="ga">ATF</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Advice Sheet</string>
            <string language="ga">Bileog Chomhairle</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses Hilfsmittel zielt darauf ab, einige der 
Fragen Eltern zu beantworten und Kursteilnehmer fragen nach dem LCA 
Programm. Die angegebenen Antworten sind die Antworten eines 
Lehrers zu diesen Fragen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette ressource vise à répondre à certains des
parents de questions et les étudiants s'enquièrent du programme de 
LCA. Les réponses fournies sont les réponses d'un professeur 
à ces questions.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este recurso aponta responder a alguns dos pais 
das perguntas e os estudantes inquirem sobre o programa de LCA. 
As respostas fornecidas são respostas de um professor a estas 
perguntas.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa risorsa mira a rispondere ad alcuni dei 
genitori di domande e gli allievi chiedono notizie sul programma di 
LCA. Le risposte fornite sono lle risposte dell'un insegnante a 
queste domande.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το στοιχείο συμπεριφοράς στοχεύει να απαντήσει 
ότι μερικοί από τους γονείς και τους σπουδαστές ερωτήσεων 
ρωτούν για το πρόγραμμα LCA. Οι απαντήσεις παρεχόμενες 
είναι απαντήσεις ενός δασκάλου σε αυτές τις ερωτήσεις.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">LCA</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Rateblatt</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">LCA</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Feuille de conseil</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">LCA</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Folha Do Conselho</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">LCA</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Foglio Di Consiglio</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">LCA</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Φύλλο συμβουλών</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>

All materials may be downloaded and copied for non-commercial purposes only, provided that the source is acknowledged. The reproduction of material for commercial purposes is strictly prohibited.

Material within the linked sites outside of Scoilnet may also have copyright restrictions and this should be checked on these websites should you plan to use their content in any way.</string>
